sentences.sContent: Confrontation between the two sides ensued for 3 hours as a result, eventually with the Vietnamese Navy retreating due to inclement weather.
sentences.sContent_eng: Confrontation between the two sides ensued for 3 hours as a result, eventually with the Vietnamese Navy retreating due to inclement weather.
sentences.sCn: 双方的对抗持续了3小时，最终越南海军由于险恶的天气而撤退。

sentences.sContent: This space wraps around the southern side of the house, and is covered by an overhanging roof. A fireplace allows residents to enjoy the outdoors, even in inclement weather.
sentences.sContent_eng: This space wraps around the southern side of the house, and is covered by an overhanging roof. A fireplace allows residents to enjoy the outdoors, even in inclement weather.
sentences.sCn: 这部分空间包裹着建筑的南面，被悬挑屋顶覆盖。即使在恶劣的天气情况下，壁炉的存在使居民可以更享受户外空间。

synos.tran: 险恶的；气候严酷的；狂风暴雨的

remMethod.val: in (不) + clement (仁慈的) → 不仁慈的 → 严酷的

words.tran: 严酷，气候严酷；天气险恶

trans.tranOther: inclement weather is unpleasantly cold, wet etc
